metadata.synopsis:
A player used an item owned by an NPC, and an NPC (the owner or someone else) witnessed this and stops the player by starting this dialog.
-- Can check the GEB_Crime_IsVictim flag on speaker 1 to distinguish the NPC from being the victim (= owner) or a witness of the crime.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Use a forbidden item in sight of its NPC owner.

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *Not everyone subscribes to 'what is mine is yours', it seems.*
0.context: NodeContext: Second warning as civilian (= first warning as civilian with a few additions from the second batch, because no final warnings as civilian)
